query:
SELECT 'users' as table_name, COUNT(*) as count FROM users
UNION ALL SELECT 'live_streams', COUNT(*) FROM live_streams
UNION ALL SELECT 'creator_contributions', COUNT(*) FROM creator_contributions
UNION ALL SELECT 'audience_contributions', COUNT(*) FROM audience_contributions
UNION ALL SELECT 'tickets', COUNT(*) FROM tickets
UNION ALL SELECT 'trade_records', COUNT(*) FROM trade_records
UNION ALL SELECT 'points_records', COUNT(*) FROM points_records
UNION ALL SELECT 'settlements', COUNT(*) FROM settlements;
command:
mysql --batch --raw --column-names --default-character-set=utf8mb4 --host gateway03.us-east-1.prod.aws.tidbcloud.com --port 4000 --user 2KMpFtxdhMwESN4.root --database h7v6obutbNu2TWm3TCgiTk --execute SELECT 'users' as table_name, COUNT(*) as count FROM users
UNION ALL SELECT 'live_streams', COUNT(*) FROM live_streams
UNION ALL SELECT 'creator_contributions', COUNT(*) FROM creator_contributions
UNION ALL SELECT 'audience_contributions', COUNT(*) FROM audience_contributions
UNION ALL SELECT 'tickets', COUNT(*) FROM tickets
UNION ALL SELECT 'trade_records', COUNT(*) FROM trade_records
UNION ALL SELECT 'points_records', COUNT(*) FROM points_records
UNION ALL SELECT 'settlements', COUNT(*) FROM settlements;
